amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute repeals the current Federal requirement that 11 States implement an "employer-trip-reduction" program. The program would become voluntary under the amendment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to repeal the current Federal requirment to implement a "employer-trip-reduction" program in 11 States. The amendment would allow states the discretion to decide whether or not to implement such plans as part of their efforts to meet Clean Air Act standards.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Commerce.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Commerce amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
